txt.en: You cleansed a host of the Ancient Evil lingering in the halls of the Mâkhda Khorbo, but the temple of ash and blood may never be untainted.

The Mâkhda Khorbo, Temple of the All-Seeing, crumbled into ruin at the moment of Sauron's defeat but remains a place of great interest for those seeking artifacts of evil. When Azagath Sea-shadow fled from the Citadel of Winds in the company of his comrades Belondor and Nakási Wave-reaper, his purpose was not escape alone. What treasure of the Dark Lord's might he have wrested from those buried ruins? Its identity remains unknown, but your pursuit of Azagath played a role in fracturing the bonds between some of these Kindred.
The Depths of Mâkhda Khorbo -- The Evil Within
Defeat many of the Ancient Evil in the Mâkhda Khorbo

The Mâkhda Khorbo, Temple of the All-Seeing, crumbled into ruin at the moment of Sauron's defeat but remains a place of great interest for those seeking artifacts of evil. When Azagath Sea-shadow fled from the Citadel of Winds in the company of his comrades Belondor and Nakási Wave-reaper, his purpose was not escape alone. What treasure of the Dark Lord's might he have wrested from those buried ruins? Its identity remains unknown, but your pursuit of Azagath played a role in fracturing the bonds between some of these Kindred.
